mapper.select: SELECT mem.u_idx, mem.u_name, re.m_idx, re.r_content, re.watchdate, re.liked FROM member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN review re ON mem.u_idx = re.u_idx WHERE re.m_idx = #{mIdx} LIMIT 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (u_idx, m_idx, r_content) VALUES (#{uIdx}, #{mIdx}, #{rContent});
mapper.delete: delete from review where u_idx = #{rIdx} and m_idx = #{mIdx}
mapper.update: update review set r_content = #{rContent}, updatedate = now() where u_idx = #{rIdx} and m_idx = #{mIdx}
